forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog between 3am and 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
A gentle calm envelops Downtown San Francisco today, as the sky presents a predominantly sunny disposition, however, hints of a marine layer linger along the coast. With temperatures hovering near sixty-two degrees, it’s a day where light layers will serve you well—perhaps a soft sweater or light jacket that can easily be shed as the sun’s warmth creeps in during the late morning hours. 

As evening approaches, expect the arrival of patchy fog, softly rolling in after midnight, wrapping the streets in a soothing embrace as a hush blankets the city. Tonight, temperatures will cool down, inviting a cozy atmosphere perfect for quiet conversations or reading a book in your favorite café. With such serene weather unfolding, a leisurely stroll through the Presidio or a visit to a local bookstore may yield delightful experiences, allowing you to soak in the subtle beauty that only San Francisco can offer on days like this.
